on reading compounds: 裳階【モコシ】pent roof (below the true roof of a pagoda, etc.)
花嫁衣裳【ハナヨメイショウ】bridal costume, wedding dress
借り衣装【カリイショウ】borrowed clothes
kun reading compounds: 裳着【もぎ】Heian period coming-of-age ceremony for girls
裳裾【もすそ】cuff (of pants), hem (of skirt), train (of dress), foot (of mountain)
